# =========================
# Visual Studio
# =========================
.vs/
*.vcxproj.user
*.vcxproj.filters
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Build folders
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
Debug*/
Release*/
x64/
x86/
ARM/
ARM64/

# Temporary files
*.log
*.tlog
*.lastbuildstate
*.cache
*.pdb
*.ipch
*.idb
*.ilk
*.aps
*.ncb
*.opendb
*.obj
*.exe
*.dll
*.lib
*.exp

# SFML dependencies
SFML/build/
SFML/bin/
SFML/lib/

# VS backup / auto-generated
*.db
*.opendb
*.VC.db
*.VC.VC.opendb

# Ignore local settings
*.opensdf
*.sdf
*.db-shm
*.db-wal

# Crash dumps and test data
*.dmp
*.tmp

# Ignore package managers
packages/
node_modules/
.vscode/

# =========================
# OS-specific files
# =========================
# macOS
.DS_Store
# Windows
Thumbs.db
desktop.ini
